title: Every Job in the Book | Ep. 21
itunes:title: Every Job in the Book | Ep. 21
description:
Karlous & DC have had every job in the book. Trash man, pipe layer, fast food, you name it. They hustled their way into comedy with a whole lot of hard work and dedication. This episode is dedicated to the many odd jobs they've had on their way up. Not to mention, a fan of the show decided they wanted to go roast for roast with the hosts. Download this podcast, subscribe to this podcast and leave a comment! #85SouthShow

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
